thread.title: BRIEF-AGTC Doses First Patient In Phase 1/2 Clinical Study Of Gene Therapy For Treatment Of X-Linked Retinitis Pigmentosa

title: BRIEF-AGTC Doses First Patient In Phase 1/2 Clinical Study Of Gene Therapy For Treatment Of X-Linked Retinitis Pigmentosa

organizations.name: gene therapy for treatment of x-linked retinitis pigmentosa market news
treatment of x-linked retinitis pigmentosa reuters

text:
Market News  11 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-AGTC Doses First Patient In Phase 1/2 Clinical Study Of Gene Therapy For Treatment Of X-Linked Retinitis Pigmentosa Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 18 (Reuters) - Applied Genetic Technologies Corp : 
* AGTC DOSES FIRST PATIENT IN PHASE 1/2 CLINICAL STUDY OF GENE THERAPY FOR TREATMENT OF X-LINKED RETINITIS PIGMENTOSA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
